text: @Alyssa_Milano Despite the horrific convergence of #COVID19, the humanistic compassion is obviously lacking, when hotel rooms are available for those with no where to lay their head and/or taxed bodies. Absolutely shameful and disgusting! #VegasStrong? More like #VegasGreed! The Strip inhumane!

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Actor
domain.description: An actor or actress in the world, like Kate Winslet or Leonardo DiCaprio

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
